name: MDS-provider-trips-without-ids-blurred-start-end
description:
MDS provider trips endpoint with one adjustment: the results don't contain device_id and vehicle_id, secondly, the route's start and end locations are blurred
The Mobility Data Specification (MDS), a project of the Open Mobility Foundation (OMF), is a set of Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) focused on shared mobility services such as dockless scooters, bicycles, mopeds, and carshare, and inspired by projects like GTFS and GBFS.

fieldModifications.exception: contains only blurred start and end location (30m)
